name: RolePlay Infinite
description:
What is it?

RolePlay Infinite (RPI) is a modern multi-user dungeon (MUD) engine that relies on players writing text to further the narrative. Complete with an integrated forum system and many tools, RPI aims to give players the freedom to live in worlds unlike our own.

Features
  • Real-Time Chat
  • Dynamic Forum System
  • UI Customization
  • Roleplaying Tools (Dice, Coins, etc.)
  • Emoji Support
  • Public Server Browser
  • Much, much more
FAQWhere is the game? I can only see words

             RPI is a text-based game, which means it uses the medium of encodable characters rather than bitmap/vector graphics.

Help

For assistance, feel free to join the Discord and report your issue or question.
